        Parameters:
        id - This node's id
        isResto - If this node is restaurant, this param will be 1
        isHotel - If this node is hotel, this param will be 1

      • Noeud

        public Noeud(int id,
             int isResto,
             int isHotel,
             int prix)
        Constructs a new Node
        Parameters:
        id - This node's id
        isResto - If this node is restaurant, this param will be 1
        isHotel - If this node is hotel, this param will be 1
        prix - The cost of this node (Randomly generated between 40-100)
